text: So it was, on the eighth day, that they came to circumcise the child,‘The eighth day’—two different blood clotting agents, vitamin K and prothrombin, are at their highest level (110% of normal) on the eighth day of a person's life, so it is the best of all days for minor surgery. Who but the Creator knew that 4000 years ago, when He told Abraham to do it? and they started calling him by the name of his father, Zacharias.
